text: The Wey Lanshan is a full-size Luxury Crossover SUV made by Wey a brand of Great Wall Motors (GWM) since 2023. == History and Features == The Wey Lanshan was debuted at the Guangzhou Auto Show in 2022 and started being produced in 2023 its based on a platform of Great Wall Motors called Coffee intelligence driving platform and is a Plug-in hybrid meaning that it has both a gasoline and a electric motor specifically a 1.5 liter turbo gasoline engine combined with a electric motor and a multi-mode transmission. == Markets == The Wey Lanshan will be sold first in China then it will be exported to other countries outside China under different names like Wey 07 and GWM Wey 07. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Wey Lanshan
